ThingDef.label: heavy hopper
ThingDef.description: Holds resources for use by automated machines.

ThingDef.label: Steel Extractor
ThingDef.description: A large machine with a series of hammers, magnets, and foundries. Hammers pound rock chunks into dust, whereafter magnets collect metallic fragments before being dropped and melted into more pure, usable pieces. This machine has a notoriously low yield as most rock chunks have a negligible amount of extractable material.\n\n<color=#33d733>Automation Chain:</color> Part of the Electronics Fabrication Factory chain.

ThingDef.label: Component Assembler
ThingDef.description: An absurdly large machine composed of a series of foundries and casting molds. Capable of fabricating any basic electronic or mechanical pieces. While automated production is consistent this machine can take a painfully long amount of time to manufacture said materials. Having this machine active creates a high chance of electrical discharge.\n\n<color=#33d733>Automation Chain:</color> Part of the Electronics Fabrication Factory chain.

ThingDef.label: Advanced Assembler
ThingDef.description: A wide factory module meant to inlay and program circuitry for high-end electronic devices. The exact inner workings of this module are somewhat enigmatic to non-spacer colonies, however the end result is of unquestionable quality.\n\n<color=#33d733>Automation Chain:</color> Part of the Electronics Fabrication Factory chain.

ThingDef.label: Chemfuel Clarifier
ThingDef.description: A rather crude machine capable of melting organics via acid into usable chemfuel. Attached hoppers will accept nearby corpses or wood matter, rapidly decompose them, then melt in a singular large vat before dispensing. Puts off a god awful stench that pawns hate and and may cause lung damage if exposed long term unless vented properly.\n\n<color=#33d733>Automation Chain:</color> Part of the Munitions and Armament Factory (M.A.F.) chain.

ThingDef.label: Mechanized Weaponsmith
ThingDef.description: A very large machine with many moving parts, able to accept steel, components, and cloth forward via belt system and slowly assemble them into basic weaponry. The machine is capable of making rudimentary light arms at a normal quality, although this process is very time and power consuming. Puts off a high amount of heat.\n\n<color=#33d733>Automation Chain:</color> Part of the Munitions and Armament Factory (M.A.F.) chain.

ThingDef.label: Artillery Foundry
ThingDef.description: An absurdly large machine composed of a series of foundries and casting molds. Capable of fabricating any basic electronic or mechanical pieces. While automated production is consistent this machine can take a painfully long amount of time to manufacture said materials. Having this machine active creates a high chance of electrical discharge.\n\n<color=#33d733>Automation Chain:</color> Part of the Munitions and Armament Factory (M.A.F.) chain.

ThingDef.label: Textile Recycler
ThingDef.description: A machine capable of quickly orienting, shredding, and sorting pieces of clothing into usable reclaimed pieces or cloth. Nowhere near fully efficient but very useful for reclaiming otherwise useless materials.\n\n<color=#33d733>Automation Chain:</color> Part of the Wearables and Textile Factory (W.T.F.) chain.

ThingDef.label: Auto Loom
ThingDef.description: A large machine that scans nearby textiles fed through two rollers, whereafter a series of clamps, shears, and needles stitch, weave, and sew basic clothing millimeters at a time. While the machine is particularly slow it is fully automated: the user only must specify the type of clothing desired.\n\n<color=#33d733>Automation Chain:</color> Part of the Wearables and Textile Factory (W.T.F.) chain.

ThingDef.label: Synthread Synthesizer
ThingDef.description: A high-tech machine that is barely understood by even the most intellectually inclined colonies. Complete with a series of meshpresses and plasma needles capable of atomically realigning basic materials resulting in new material indistinguishable from synthread. Rather than creating material itself, the machine is configured to modify existing clothing.\n\n<color=#33d733>Automation Chain:</color> Part of the Wearables and Textile Factory (W.T.F.) chain.

ThingDef.label: Meat Grinder
ThingDef.description: A medium-sized but intimidating machine, corpses are pulled in via clamps before being weighed, analyzed and crudely torn apart. Flesh chunks are then ground into a finely processed and surprisingly flavorful but perplexing meat. This process is very efficient and results in slower but higher meat yield than normal butchering. Due to the all-encompassing nature of the process the machine will not yield any leather or skin from the corpses insert.\n\n<color=#33d733>Automation Chain:</color> Part of the Provisions Packaging Factory (P.P.F.) chain.

ThingDef.label: Conveyor Oven
ThingDef.description: A very long industrial-sized oven with a central conveyor belt and vacuum system, capable of accepting nearby raw food from attached hoppers and processing it. Basic packaged meals and dried goods can easily be produced. Puts off a lot of heat while cooking.\n\n<color=#33d733>Automation Chain:</color> Part of the Provisions Packaging Factory (P.P.F.) chain.

ThingDef.label: Neutroamine Infuser
ThingDef.description: A large industrial vat meant for making the ever-elusive neutroamine precursor product. While the exact recipe for the product is generally a trade secret the end result from this machine is a thick glycerol made from rendered fat very similar to neutroamine and fully capable of being made into further products.\n\n<color=#33d733>Automation Chain:</color> Part of the Medicinal Compounding Factory (M.C.F.) chain.

ThingDef.label: Medicine Granulator
ThingDef.description: A machine capable of granulating via mill then pressing medical products into pills using a series of clamps and shaped presses. Also capable of manufacturing prefabricated health kits. Due to the rudimentary nature of this module, blockages are not uncommon, when blocked a pawn must come by to realign the presses before production can resume.\n\n<color=#33d733>Automation Chain:</color> Part of the Medicinal Compounding Factory (M.C.F.) chain.

ThingDef.label: Drug Powderizer
ThingDef.description: Capable of working in tandem with a medicine granulator to finely process and powderize psychoid leave extract, then package it for later use or selling.\n\n<color=#33d733>Automation Chain:</color> Part of the Medicinal Compounding Factory (M.C.F.) chain.
